translations.translation: Build your Disaster Recovery Plan with Zerto

Protect your operating system by configuring a Disaster Recovery Plan. In just one click, you can migrate your infrastructure if you experience any technical issues or service interruptions. Please note that you must have a secondary Private Cloud before you activate this option.
Your datacentre does not currently have any hosts. Please order one to use this datacentre for your DRP, or select a datacentre with at least one host.
Between two OVH Private Cloud solutions
Between your infrastructure and an OVH Private Cloud solution
An error has occurred retrieving information about your DRP.
